wybug_title: 迅雷某频道的ssh登录信息泄露
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-07-22：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-07-23：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 迅雷 详细说明：  迅雷某频道的ssh登录信息泄露原来 sandai.net 也叫迅雷？  不是这次还真不知道。。http://mojie.xunlei.com/.bash_history应该是SSH的登陆用户名  ssh developer@tj28.sandai.netssh developer@tj28.sandai.netssh developer@tj98.sandai.netssh developer@tj98.sandai.netexitssh developer@tj98.sandai.netssh developer@tj28.sandai.netssh developer@tj98.sandai.netexitssh developer@tj98.sandai.netextiexitssh developer@tj98.sandai.netexitssh developer@tj98.sandai.netssh developer@tj98.sandai.netexitssh developer@tj98.sandai.netssh developer@tj98.sandai.netssh developer@tj98.sandai.netssh developer@tj98.sandai.netessh tj19.sandai.netssh tj19.sandai.netssh gameguest@tj19.sandai.netssh developer@tj98.sandai.netssh developer@tj98.sandai.net



   漏洞证明：  原来 sandai.net 也叫迅雷？  不是这次还真不知道。。http://mojie.xunlei.com/.bash_history应该是SSH的登陆用户名  ssh developer@tj28.sandai.netssh developer@tj28.sandai.netssh developer@tj98.sandai.netssh developer@tj98.sandai.netexitssh developer@tj98.sandai.netssh developer@tj28.sandai.netssh developer@tj98.sandai.netexitssh developer@tj98.sandai.netextiexitssh developer@tj98.sandai.netexitssh developer@tj98.sandai.netssh developer@tj98.sandai.netexitssh developer@tj98.sandai.netssh developer@tj98.sandai.netssh developer@tj98.sandai.netssh developer@tj98.sandai.netessh tj19.sandai.netssh tj19.sandai.netssh gameguest@tj19.sandai.netssh developer@tj98.sandai.netssh developer@tj98.sandai.net
